title: Game Files Corrupted
body:
Using WINE on linux. Latest update broke the game with game files corrupted -> repair -> files corrupted -> repair endlessly looping. 

No issues previously. Tried reinstalling. Same problem. 

https://askubuntu.com/questions/798927/league-of-legends-issue

Used this solution to get into the client, but then experienced crashes / core dumps on connect.

replies.body: Your chances of getting help here are near nil, look for a WINE-specific or Linux gaming forum
